description:
This “Build an App Business: How to Make Money with Apps” course is designed for non-technical entrepreneurs who are interested in getting involved with the iPhone app business. There are several skills app entrepreneurs can learn to increase their probability of success. For example learning how to prototype your own apps will allow you to communicate visually and more effectively with your developers/designers. Making app frameworks will save your development costs because you can spread your development costs across several apps. The power of the app network will reduce your risk because now you don't need one hit app but can have several solid apps.

You will learn all this and more from this “Build an App Business” course.

Take this ultimate Build an App Business course and learn how to make money with Apps.

</p>
title: Build an App Business
